main event: A UFO was reported in Dalty, Utah, where an object was observed changing colors and brightness.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than it appeared and disc-shaped,Much brighter than the planet Venus,The color of the object changed from white to red-orange while it was stationary,The object appeared to be standing still during the observation,The conclusion of the report suggested that the object was actually the planet Venus.
witness description: a civilian, age 47, truck driver from Salt Lake City, Utah
